name: SFMade, Inc.
description: SFMade's mission is to build and support a vibrant manufacturing sector in San Francisco that sustains companies producing locally made products, encourages entrepreneurship and innovation, and creates employment opportunities for a diverse local workforce. Staff are currently working remotely and, in the field, but can be reached by mail at: 150 Hooper St, Unit 200 San Francisco, CA 94107 For general inquiries, please contact them at info@sfmade.org
